itemize:
\begin{itemize}
\item
$p_0=p+1$ integer ($p\geq2$)
\item
$w_j$ all real and different
\item
$\omega=0$ or $\omega=\frac{\pi}{2}$
\

\begin{itemize}
\item
case ${\cal A}$: $\omega=0$,
\item
case ${\cal B}_1$: $\omega=\frac{\pi}{2}$, \ \ $p_0$ odd,
\item
case ${\cal B}_2$: $\omega=\frac{\pi}{2}$, \ \ $p_0$ even.
\

\begin{itemize}
\item $W_a(\xi):$ \ \  no zeroes for $a$ odd
\item[{}] $\phantom{W_a(\xi):}$ \ \ double zero at $\xi=0$ for $a$ even
\item all $W_a(\xi)$ are negative, except $W_p(\xi)$ in the
$A_{2p-1}^s$ case
\
